SimplicitObjects.Name: Possibly use this to set up multi object scenes later for io/indexing
SimplicitObjects.SetFixedBC_code: indices = torch.nonzero(X0[:,0] < 0.05, as_tuple=False).squeeze() #fix the whole left side of shape
SimplicitObjects.SetMovingBC_code: indices = torch.nonzero(X0[:,0] > 0.95, as_tuple=False).squeeze() #move the whole right side of shape
